SEARCH

Interface PlayGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
Parent, Player
public interface PlayGame
Interface that defines the methods for interacting with the game. These methods allow the player to view the state of their pet, available commands, gift options, and go back to a previous screen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    back()
    Simulates going back to a previous screen or menu in the game.
    void
    displayAllCommands()
    Displays a list of all available commands that the player can execute during gameplay.
    void
    displayGiftCommands()
    Displays the available gift commands that the player can give to their pet.
    void
    displayPetState()
    Displays the current state of the pet, including health, sleep, fullness, happiness, and any other relevant data.

  • Method Details

    • displayPetState

      void displayPetState()
      Displays the current state of the pet, including health, sleep, fullness, happiness, and any other relevant data.

    • displayAllCommands

      void displayAllCommands()
      Displays a list of all available commands that the player can execute during gameplay.

    • displayGiftCommands

      void displayGiftCommands()
      Displays the available gift commands that the player can give to their pet.

    • back

      void back()
      Simulates going back to a previous screen or menu in the game.
